item.text: WCN is a media Channel and maintained in a fairly decentralized way. Apart from covering crypto-currency news, it specializes in investigative journalism, covers social and political sphere, and social aspects of technology (cryptography and decentralized consensus in particular)

WCN is a media Channel and maintained in a fairly decentralized way. Apart from covering crypto-currency news, it specializes in investigative journalism, covers social and political sphere, and social aspects of technology (in particular, cryptography and decentralized consensus)
For subjects less specific to Bitcoin watch [http://www.worldcryptonetwork.com/2014/12/chris-before-coffee.html Chris Before Coffee]
Channel contributors organize panel discussions, interviews, and cover events, conferences and workshops.

WCN is a media channel and maintained in a fairly decentralized way. Apart from covering crypto-currency news, it specializes in investigative journalism, covers social and political sphere, and social aspects of technology (in particular, cryptography and decentralized consensus)

WCN is a media channel. Apart from covering crypto-currency news, it specializes in investigative journalism, covers social and political sphere, and social aspects of technology (in particular, cryptography and decentralized consensus)

Channel contributors organize panel discussions, interviews, and cover events, conferences and workshops. Content is streamed live with interactive Q&A sessions. Easiest way to find out when WCN will be on air is to follow [https://twitter.com/WorldCryptoNet on Twitter]
